overview:
Kirk is the Founder of Creativ.es, a branded job site that exclusively serves the needs of companies and agencies seeking creative talent to promote themselves to a burgeoning community of design and technical innovators. Kirk launched Creativ.es at the TechCrunch Disrupt conference in San Francisco on Sept. 12th 2011. Creativ.es is currently running in a public beta.

Kirk is also the Principle of Device Creative and continues to create highly interactive communications for clients and agencies alike.
